dashboard.card_total_post.title: Total post
dashboard.card_total_post.text: All posts created across all platforms connected to Lovelace (Discord, Steam, Reddit, etc.)

dashboard.card_engagement_rate.title: Engagement rate
dashboard.card_engagement_rate.text: • Engagement Rate shows the percentage of your community that actively interacts with your content over a selected time period.

dashboard.card_new_sub.title: New Sub/follower
dashboard.card_new_sub.text:
• Number of new followers or members across all platforms connected to Lovelace.
• By default, calculated over the last 30 days. (You can adjust the period with the calendar filter.)

dashboard.card_total_sub.title: Total Subs / Followers
dashboard.card_total_sub.text: Total number of followers, subscribers, or members across all connected platforms (Discord, Steam, Reddit, etc.).

dashboard.card_interactions.title: Interactions
dashboard.card_interactions.text:
• Any direct interaction from a user (like posting, commenting, reacting)
• Replies to a post
• Mentions related to your project

This measures the active participation of your community beyond just following or observing.

dashboard.card_wishlist.title: Wishlist steam
dashboard.card_wishlist.text:
• Schrödinger’s Players. 
They might buy it... or never open Steam again.

• You had them at "Add to Library" ...they're just waiting for payday.
